mapper.select: SELECT PUSER_NAME, PRODUCT_AMOUNT, PRODUCT_DATE, CATEGORY_NAME FROM DONATE_PRODUCT JOIN PRODUCT_CATEGORY USING (CATEGORY_NO)
SELECT PUSER_NAME, PRODUCT_AMOUNT, PRODUCT_DATE, CATEGORY_NAME FROM DONATE_PRODUCT JOIN PRODUCT_CATEGORY USING (CATEGORY_NO)

SELECT PROGRAM_NAME, PROGRAM_ACTIVITY_START_DATE, PROGRAM_ACTIVITY_END_DATE, USER_NAME FROM LIKES L JOIN USERS U ON (U.USER_NO = L.USER_NO) JOIN PROGRAM P ON (L.PROGRAM_NO = P.PROGRAM_NO) WHERE U.USER_NO = '2'
